description:
3rd and final battle between Soma and Nene is heating up, as they are putting everything they`ve got in the dish! As the theme of shokugeki being Soba, Nene is in her element and finishes first. Her dish is highly praised by the judges so what will Soma cook up to turn the situation around!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce qui pousse les plus forts
